DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective of this project is to determine the safety and breast tissue bioavailability of limonene following massage application of limonene containing massage oil to the breast.
DOC.brief_title: Human Breast Tissue Bioavailability of Topically Applied Limonene
DOC.criteria: Women who are 1865 years of age ECOG performance status 01 Normal organ and marrow function Women of childbearing potential must agree to use adequate contraception Willing to avoid consumption and use of citrus or citrus containing products throughout the study Have both breasts intact Have had cancer(s) within the past 5 years Participated in another clinical interventional trial within the past 3 months Uncontrolled intercurrent illness Pregnant or breast feeding Unable to produce nipple aspirate fluid Have known allergic or sensitive reactions to skin care products, citrus or coconut oil Have ongoing skin disorders such as eczema and psoriasis
